description: Butterfly Bush (Buddleja davidii 'Attraction') is a popular and attractive summer flowering shrub. It's well known for its attractive flower spikes in a range of vibrant colours. It's sensory appeal doesn't end there though - it's butterfly attracting power is almost legendary. It's an incredibly easy to care for bush, needs little maintenance and is drought tolerant added bonus. It has great ornamental value in gardens and landscapes for that burst of colour and life with its beautiful arching branches that provide structure. It can easily fit into a native or exotic garden. Butterfly Bush (Buddleja davidii ‘Attraction’) is a must have for gardeners and nature lovers alike.
